name: Ludo Club - Fun Dice Game
description:
Play Ludo online with friends and be a star - play LUDO CLUB!

This is the online multiplayer version of the epic hit board game Ludo! Join an exclusive club of elite players in this premium game - be the best player and become the KING OF LUDO!

Learn how to move your red, yellow, green or blue pieces with strategy and luck... Be the king of of Ludo and become a star! Compete against other players and reach the top of the leaderboard! Download and install for hours of fun and enjoyment.


Exciting Features:
- Play with friends and family
- Connect to facebook and play on different devices!
- Use very little data - works smoothly on 2G, 3G, 4G!
- Play in offline mode vs Computer and with your friends
- Send gifts to co-players and friends
- Chat with other players
- Customise your pawns, and use new board designs!
- Win FREE coins using our Daily Bonus and Lucky Dice features to keep playing!


Install now and play India’s favourite board game from India’s favourite game app developer: Let’s roll the dice!
In India, it’s versions are Chopat, Chaupur, Pachisi or Parcheesi.
